text: The simple act of paying positive attention to people has a great deal to do with productivity
author: Tom Peters

text: Leadership is practiced not so much in words as in attitude and in actions
author: Harold S. Geneen

text: If you don't imagine, nothing ever happens at all
author: John Green

text: I don't do drugs. I am drugs.
author: Salvador Dali

text: I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying
author: Oscar Wilde

text: Our lives are composed of a finite set of moments that we choose how to spend
author: John Green

text: I ain’t no hipster, but girl I can make your hips stir
author: Mac Miller

text: Our fearlessness shall be our secret weapon
author: John Green

text: Sometimes the way you think about someone isn't the way they actually are
author: John Green

text: The most interesting hipsters are ones who stop being hipsters
author: Greg Fitzsimmons

text: Civilization begins with distillation
author: William Faulkner

text: All that we are is the result of what we have thought
author: Buddha

text: I have no special talent. I am only passionately curious
author: Albert Einstein

text: If you judge people, you have no time to love them
author: Mother Teresa

text: The future belongs to those who prepare for it today
author: Malcolm X

text: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus
author: Bruce Lee

text: It always seems impossible until it’s done
author: Nelson Mandela

text: The unexamined life is not worth living
author: Socrates

text: Our life is frittered away by detail… simplify, simplify
author: Henry David

text: Try not to become a man of success but rather to become a man of value
author: Albert Einstein

text: The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong
author: Mahatma Gandhi

text: Whatever you are, be a good one
author: Abraham Lincoln

text: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are
author: Theodore Roosevelt

text: Little by little, one travels far
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

text: You have power over your mind – not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength
author: Marcus Aurelius

text: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible
author: Dalai Lama

text: Love the life you live. Live the life you love
author: Bob Marley

text: By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: I think, therefore I am
author: René Descartes

text: To be, or not to be, that is the question
author: William Shakespeare

text: The only thing that interferes with my learning is my education
author: Albert Einstein

text: Ask not what your country can do for you, but what you can do for your country
author: John F. Kennedy

text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

text: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step
author: Lao Tzu

text: Great minds discuss ideas, average minds discuss events, small minds discuss people
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

text: Those who dare to fail miserably can achieve greatly
author: John F. Kennedy

text: Remember that the happiest people are not those getting more, but those giving more
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

text: If you want to be happy, be
author: Leo Tolstoy

text: If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things
author: Albert Einstein

text: It does not matter how slowly you go so long as you do not stop
author: Confucius

text: You miss 100 percent of the shots you never take
author: Wayne Gretzky

text: Big Brother is watching you
author: George Orwell

text: Keep calm and carry on
author: Winston Churchill

text: Be proud of who you are
author: Eminem

text: We need fantasy to survive reality
author: Lady Gaga

text: Have no fear of perfection, you’ll never reach it
author: Salvador Dali

text: The future starts today, not tomorrow
author: Pope John Paul II
